AddObject.ConfigEntryObject: <Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>AveragePersonRiskIndexByRole</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, average risk index is {1}", SizeValue ,numformat(ColorValue, '0.00'),ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><RedLimit>1</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>AveragePersonRiskIndexByRoleMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>AveragePersonRiskIndexByRoleYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#{2}: {0} members, average risk index {3} by {1}", SizeValue ,numformat(abs(ColorValue), '0.00'),ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"))</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Average employee risk index")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Employees")</SizeValueTerm> </Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>RequestsByOrg</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate('#LDS#The "{0}" business role has {1} requests distributed among a total of {2} employees.', ObjectDisplay, ColorValue, SizeValue)</Tooltip><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>false</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>none</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>none</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>min</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate('#LDS#Number of requests')</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate('#LDS#Number of employees')</SizeValueTerm></Object>
